code: import React,{useState}from'react';import projectsData from'../DataFiles/ProjectsData';import'../CSS/Projects.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Projects(){const[fullscreenImage,setFullscreenImage]=useState(null);const openFullscreen=image=>{setFullscreenImage(image);};const closeFullscreen=()=>{setFullscreenImage(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ProjectBody",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"ProjectList",children:projectsData.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"ProjectElement",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ProjectColumn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ProjectHeader",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"ProjectMaker",children:project.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"ProjectTitle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.githubLink,rel:"noreferrer",target:"_blank",children:project.title})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"ProjectDescription",children:project.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ProjectColumn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"ProjectImage",src:project.image,alt:project.title,onClick:()=>openFullscreen(project.image)})})]},index))}),fullscreenImage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"FullscreenOverlay",onClick:closeFullscreen,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"FullscreenImage",src:fullscreenImage,alt:"Fullscreen"})})]});}export default Projects;
